title: Barbie Movie Soundtrack #6: Barbie & The Diamond Castle
description:
As of March 2009, there are seven unique soundtracks released for the Barbie films. I am in the process of obtaining and sharing them all. I will also continue to collect as more soundtracks are released.
I previously listed there being twelve, but I recently discovered they are German releases of radio plays. I don't think I'll be obtaining those in the near future...my German is nonexistent.

A cute movie, the brothers were enjoyable, but I found the mute puppies a little tiresome. I was quite surprised the music team defaulted to the use of pop song "Connected", but Melissa Lyons and Cassidy Ladden have such wonderful voices it's easy to overlook.

I have one surprise soundtrack I'll be uploading shortly. I never knew it existed until I purchased it thinking it was something else!

Barbie & The Diamond Castle Soundtrack
Track Listing:
1. Connected
2. Two Voices, One Song
3. We're Gonna Find It
4. Believe
5. Two Voices, One Song (movie version)
6. Wonderful Me
7. We're Gonna Find It (movie version)
8. Double Vision
9. Connected
10. I Need To Know (bonus track from The Island Princess)
11. Shine (bonus track from The 12 Dancing Princesses)

Enjoy, everyone! A thank you would be wonderful. :D


***
I am missing these albums. If anyone has them and would like to help complete this collection, I would be greatly appreciative.
